data.title: First Horizon Christian Academy
data.text:
Tuition

Full Time Rates: Monday Through Friday

Infants: $240/Week

Ones: $200/Week

Twos: $185/Week

Three â€“ Five Years: $165/Week

VPK (8:30 to 11:30): FREE

VPK Wrap Around Care: $475.00 per Month

School Age: $165/Week

Part Time Rates:

M/W/F: $540.00 per Month

Tuesday/Thursday: $435.00 per Month

*Part Time spots are offered when available for ages one and up.

Subsidy Opportunities

As a ministry of The Cross Church, financial assistance may be available to help lower income families or families dealing with hardships pay for child care, allowing parents to focus on work or school knowing their child is in a healthy, caring environment. The school director can provide more information on financial assistance and help with the process.
